name: H3 Tour Management
upgrade_notice: Latest version with enhanced nested tour zip structure support and large file upload improvements for Pantheon.
author: H3 Photography

sections.description: Comprehensive 3D Tour Management system with analytics, email notifications, and user management. Supports nested tour zip structures (TOURNAME/Web.zip/Web/) and large file uploads up to 1GB on Pantheon.
sections.installation: 1. Download the plugin zip file. 2. Upload through WordPress admin or extract to wp-content/plugins/. 3. Activate the plugin. 4. Go to 3D Tours menu to start managing your tours.
sections.changelog:
1.4.20 - 2025-09-21

  • Fixed plugin activation errors with optional plugin update checker
  • Enhanced nested zip structure support for new tour formats
  • Improved large file upload handling for Pantheon environments
  • Added comprehensive debugging for troubleshooting upload issues
sections.features: Upload ZIP tours with chunked processing, manage tour access by user, analytics integration with Google Analytics 4, email notifications, rename and delete tours, support for nested zip structures.
